instructions: You may need to search for your Roku on your device, but as a rule, you ll find something on your Android device with a label such as Cast or Screen Sharing under either Display or System in the Settings app. If Screen sharing isn't already enabled, tap the toggle switch to On . From here, you can also edit your phone's name and view any devices you're able to screen share with. Depending on which Android you have, you may only use some of the screen or the video may get a little blocky depending on the quality of the stream and speed of your device. You should also set the volume low and gradually turn it up, as how loudly the audio comes through also depends on your device's settings.
